faq.q: And after I have filled my inventory with hundreds of diamonds?
faq.a: Well, first of all. You create a chest to store your diamonds in. Then, you can focus building stuff instead of demolishing it, build a nice mansion, a railroad using carts, everything is possible.

Tap on a workbench, or the inventory button. Then you can drag and drop items from your inventory to the crafting area. Tap any results you get in the big result area, to move the results to your inventory.

faq.q: The dark night is annoying. Anything I can do about it?
faq.a: Yes, you can craft a bed. When you tap your bed at night, you will go to sleep, and a few seconds later you wake up and it's a new day!
